markdownRemark.html:
This is one of the projects developed in Go Stack, the Bootcamp of Rocketseat.

In this project I create an application that makes a request for the Github API and shows the searched repositories.

Requirements

  • Use Typescript;
  • Use Styled-Components;
  • Replicate Layout;

Repository link on Github: covidnews.
